*** SUBSTITUTION TESTS ***

   Input: 291 0000000100100011
Expected: 16579 0100000011000011
  Actual: 16579 0100000011000011

   Input: 17767 0100010101100111
Expected: 35753 1000101110101001
  Actual: 35753 1000101110101001

   Input: 33623 1000001101010111
Expected: 54201 1101001110111001
  Actual: 54201 1101001110111001

   Input: 30001 0111010100110001
Expected: 39728 1001101100110000
  Actual: 39728 1001101100110000

   Input: 23130 0101101001011010
Expected: 45746 1011001010110010
  Actual: 45746 1011001010110010

*** PERMUTATION TESTS ***

   Input: 61440 1111000000000000
Expected: 34952 1000100010001000
  Actual: 34952 1000100010001000

   Input: 3840 0000111100000000
Expected: 17476 0100010001000100
  Actual: 17476 0100010001000100

   Input: 240 0000000011110000
Expected: 8738 0010001000100010
  Actual: 8738 0010001000100010

   Input: 15 0000000000001111
Expected: 4369 0001000100010001
  Actual: 4369 0001000100010001

   Input: 23130 0101101001011010
Expected: 23130 0101101001011010
  Actual: 23130 0101101001011010

*** FOUR ROUND TEST ***

   Input: 12033 0010111100000001
Expected: 20025 0100111000111001
  Actual: 20025 0100111000111001

   Input: 62153 1111001011001001
Expected: 7495 0001110101000111
  Actual: 7495 0001110101000111

*** CHALLENGE VECTOR ***

   Input: 13571 0011010100000011
Expected: 0 0000000000000000
  Actual: 45858 1011001100100010
